target_audience: Adults (25-55), both genders, interested in fitness, technology, and style
color_scheme: Green, brown, white, silver, black. The mood is energetic and sophisticated.
composition: Split image: lifestyle on top, product-focused below. The top half shows a man running, split between a soccer field and a city street. The bottom half features close-ups of the product.
cta_type: None explicit, implied by showcasing features
special_elements: Product features highlighted with icons, heart rate display on the watch face
